name: Corrobot-Takeover
description:
ALRIGHT, LISTEN UP ROOKIE! 

Corrobot-Takeover is a take-over-type game, where the goal is to conquer the enemy bases on the battlefield. 

Whichever side takes all enemy bases first, wins. We're the bad guys here, so you want to be commanding the black-and-red troops, YOU GOT THAT?! 

 I'll tell you more about it when you download the game, just trust me rookie! 

 This game was heavily inspired by the game "Mushroom wars".

Credits:

  1. https://github.com/MagicBOTAlex (Programmer, AI, Debugger)
  2. https://github.com/Sveske-Juice (Programmer)
  3. https://github.com/TheOlivier (Music creator)
  4. Alex ASDGEW#8715 (Wanted to code in Python or Rust)
  5. Zylvezter  (Artist/animator)
